suite.name: TestHawaii

test.name: Get a particular touristic Hawaiian place

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=mySession, url=http://localhost:8080, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://localhost:8080/places path_url=/places headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.2', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: {'Vary': 'Origin, Access-Control-Request-Method, Access-Control-Request-Headers', 'X-Content-Type-Options': 'nosniff', 'X-XSS-Protection': '1; mode=block', 'Cache-Control': 'no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate', 'Pragma': 'no-cache', 'Expires': '0', 'Content-Type': 'application/hal+json', 'Transfer-Encoding': 'chunked', 'Date': 'Sun, 19 Feb 2023 10:35:58 GMT', 'Keep-Alive': 'timeout=60', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'}

kw.name: Convert To String

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
